about.title: Hi!
about.subtitle: I'm Ryan ferdiansyah
about.desc: A beginner backend developer who focuses on developing web systems using PHP and relational database management systems (RDBMS). Currently, I am continuing to learn and deepen my understanding of REST APIs, query optimization, and the basics of algorithms. In addition to developing website systems, I am also quite interested in tinkering with Android, both from the software (system) and hardware sides, simply for exploration and to increase my technical knowledge.

tech-stack.title: The tech stack i use
tech-stack.desc: The tech stack I typically use in developing projects includes PHP and Laravel for the backend, MySQL as the database, and Livewire, Tailwind CSS, and JavaScript for the frontend. I am quite familiar with using these frontend technologies to support feature development, although my main focus remains on the backend and I am still learning to improve my frontend skills.
